snippet.title: Capture Card Test: "Kash Dash"- Nick Plug-N-Play Games
snippet.description:
I recently got a capture card for $4 at a garage sale, so here's some test footage of me exploiting a glitch, if you can call it that, in one of my favorite childhood games, where you can set all the players to be the CPU and the game plays itself, making a pretty cool screensaver.

I remember back when my friends and I used to make bets on who would "win" the game when it was playing itself like this.

As of now, there appears to be some A/V sync issues with the capture card, unless that's just a problem with playback.
The capture device in use is a VIDBOX by Honestech.
